Bring the body, the mind will follow.

Hope is the thing with feathers
That perches in the soul
And sings the tune without the words
And never stops at all
– Emily Dickinson

Atheism is a non-prophet organization.

Green grass and high tides forever
Castles of stone, souls and glory
Lost faces say we adore you
As kings and queens bow and play for you

Yeah, they play just for you

I am. I was. I am not. I never am.

Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad.
– Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

Life is too short to remain unnoticed.

Good things will happen to you outside your comfort zone.
– Todd Motto

Character is what you are in the dark.

If the eyes are as calming as the ocean, neither are they without wrecks.
So don't delve too deeply into those of the person you love, as you may well not like what you find there.

Suddenly – last summer

You will learn more by pretending to know nothing than by pretending to know everything.
– Mike Monteiro
